parameters.description: The identifier of the synthesis.

get.summary: Gets a list of long audio syntheses for the authenticated subscription.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of syntheses that will be skipped.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Number of syntheses that will be included after skipping.

400.description: In case the operation cannot be performed successfully with the specified values.

application/json.message: The skip query parameter must have a non-negative value

401.description: In case the user isn't authorized.

application/json.message: Authentication is required to access the resource.

403.description: In case authorized user isn't known or doesn't have the required permissions.

application/json.message: No permission to access this resource.

429.description: In case the rate limit has been exceeded.

Retry-After.description: The minimum number of seconds to wait before not getting this response anymore.

application/json.message: The rate limit has been reached. The timeout in seconds can be found in the Retry-After header.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The name of this long audio synthesis (required).

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Optional description of this long audio synthesis

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale of this long audio synthesis (required).

parameters.name: models
parameters.description: The string representation of the list of models to be used in this long audio synthesis. Available models can be fetched through /voices API. e.g. [{"id": "Guid1"},{"id": "GUID2"}] If a voice is public available, it can also be referenced by voiceName. e.g. [{"voiceName": "en-US-GuyNeural"}] The input script should be an SSML file if mutilple models are set. (required)

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Optional audio output format information (Default value: riff-16khz-16bit-mono-pcm. Supported output format: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/speech-service/long-audio-api#audio-output-formats).

parameters.name: concatenateResult
parameters.description: An optional bool value indicating if synthesis result is concatenated. If it isn't set, the audio outputs will be generated per paragraph. If set to true, synthesis results will be concatenated into one output file. (Default value: false)

parameters.name: destinationContainerUrl
parameters.description: An optional URL with Service adhoc SAS to a writeable container in Azure Blob storage. If set, results of this long audio synthesis will be pushed to the provided blob container.

parameters.name: customProperties
parameters.description: Optional properties of this long audio synthesis. The maximum allowed key length is 64 characters, the maximum allowed value length is 256 characters and the count of allowed entries is 10.

parameters.name: script
parameters.description: The script text file of the long audio synthesis.

201.description: The response contains the location of the entity as header.

Location.description: The location of the created resource.

400.description: In case the operation cannot be performed successfully with the specified values.

application/json.message: The specified model does not exist or is not accessible.

401.description: In case the user isn't authorized.

application/json.message: Authentication is required to access the resource.

403.description: In case authorized user isn't known or doesn't have the required permissions.

application/json.message: No permission to access this resource.

415.description: In case the media type of a file part is not supported.

application/json.message: The request entity's media type 'application/xml' is not supported for this resource.

429.description: In case the rate limit has been exceeded.

Retry-After.description: The minimum number of seconds to wait before not getting this response anymore.

application/json.message: The rate limit has been reached. The timeout in seconds can be found in the Retry-After header.

get.summary: Gets the files of the long audio synthesis identified by the given ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the synthesis.

parameters.name: sasValidityInSeconds
parameters.description: The duration in seconds that an SAS url should be valid. The default duration is 12 hours.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of files that will be skipped.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Number of files that will be included after skipping.

Retry-After.description: The minimum number of seconds to wait for a non terminal operation to complete.

400.description: In case the operation cannot be performed successfully with the specified values.

401.description: In case the user isn't authorized.

application/json.message: Authentication is required to access the resource.

403.description: In case authorized user isn't known or doesn't have the required permissions.

application/json.message: No permission to access this resource.

Retry-After.description: The minimum number of seconds to wait before not getting this response anymore.

application/json.message: The rate limit has been reached. The timeout in seconds can be found in the Retry-After header.

properties.description: Additional configuration options when creating a new synthesis and additional metadata provided by the service.

displayName.description: The display name of the object.

locale.description: The locale of the contained data.

customProperties.description:
The custom properties of this entity. The maximum allowed key length is 64 characters, the maximum
allowed value length is 256 characters and the count of allowed entries is 10.

lastActionDateTime.description:
The time-stamp when the current status was entered.
The time stamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format
("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

createdDateTime.description:
The time-stamp when the object was created.
The time stamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format
("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

concatenateResult.description: A value indicating whether synthesis result is concatenated.

totalDuration.description: The duration of all synthesized audio. The duration is encoded as ISO 8601 duration.

billableCharacterCount.description: Number of billable characters in the input file.

destinationContainerUrl.description: The requested destination container. It is an URL with Service adhoc SAS to a writeable container in Azure Blob storage.

error.description: The details of the error in case the entity is in a failed state.

customProperties.description:
The custom properties of this entity. The maximum allowed key length is 64 characters, the maximum
allowed value length is 256 characters and the count of allowed entries is 10.

values.description:
A list of entities limited by either the passed query parameters 'skip' and 'top' or their default values.
            
When iterating through a list using pagination and deleting entities in parallel, some entities will be skipped in the results.
It's recommended to build a list on the client and delete after the fetching of the complete list.

@nextLink.description: A link to the next set of paginated results if there are more entities available; otherwise null.

values.description:
A list of entities limited by either the passed query parameters 'skip' and 'top' or their default values.
            
When iterating through a list using pagination and deleting entities in parallel, some entities will be skipped in the results.
It's recommended to build a list on the client and delete after the fetching of the complete list.

@nextLink.description: A link to the next set of paginated results if there are more entities available; otherwise null.

properties.description: Additional metadata available for the voice.

locale.description: The locale of the contained data.

createdDateTime.description:
The time-stamp when the object was created.
The time stamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format
("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

publicAvailable.description: A value indicating whether the voice is public available.

speakers.description: A collection of speakers in the voice.

roles.description: A collection of supported roles in this voice.

styles.description: A collection of supported styles in this voice.

values.description:
A list of entities limited by either the passed query parameters 'skip' and 'top' or their default values.
            
When iterating through a list using pagination and deleting entities in parallel, some entities will be skipped in the results.
It's recommended to build a list on the client and delete after the fetching of the complete list.

links.description: The links for additional actions or content related to this file.

createdDateTime.description:
The creation time of this file.
The time stamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format
(see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

properties.description: Additional metadata provided by the service.

contentUrl.description: The url to retrieve the content of this file.

size.description: The size of the data in bytes.

duration.description:
The duration in case this file is an audio file. The duration is encoded as ISO 8601
duration ("PnYnMnDTnHnMnS", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations).

Endpoint.name: endpoint
Endpoint.description: Supported Cognitive Services endpoints (protocol and hostname, for example: https://westus2.api.cognitive.microsoft.com).

subscription_key.description: Provide your cognitive services subscription key here.
subscription_key.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

token.description: Provide an access token from the JWT returned by the STS of this region. Make sure to add the management scope to the token by adding the following query string to the STS URL: ?scope=speechservicesmanagement
token.name: Authorization
